CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1950, pg. 22, reads: "Heavier Ezz Charles Set to Face Beshore in Buffalo - The Champ in Action - The Courier cameraman was on the scene last week in Pittsburgh to catch these action shots of NBA King Ezzard Charles as he went through training chores for his coming fight with Freddie Beshore, in Buffalo, N. Y., Feb. 28. The fight will be Ezzard's third defense of his heavyweight title.  in middle photo he's shown going a few fast rounds with his sparring partner, Al Smith... - Harris Photos."
TitMainTitle: Boxer Ezzard Charles with left fist extended at sparring partner Al Smith, in boxing ring in Uptown Gym
